creator: Euronews
descriptionHtml:
Get news from a European perspective. The Euronews app offers:
✔ An OFFLINE MODE: Read stories without Internet connection
✔ A DATA SAVINGS feature to use less mobile data
✔ A SUPER-QUICK DOWNLOAD thanks to its lightweight (less than 5Mo)

★★ Say HELLO to the new Euronews for Android ★★
Every story can be told in many ways: See the perspectives from Euronews journalists in our other language teams.
Catch the latest breaking national and world news in the Euronews app. Enjoy live streaming videos, live TV and VOD, top stories, headlines and various programmes on Economy, Finance, Business, Sports, Politics and Culture!

TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD EURONEWS
#1 - A timeline of all the NEWS, wires, reports and magazines
#2 - TV in LIVE streaming
#3 - Special features of mobile DATA SAVING & OFFLINE MODE
#4 - VOD : Various programmes on Economy, Finance, Business, Sports, Politics and Culture
#5 - Giving access to INDEPENDENT, trustworthy and relevant news and business stories

THE EURONEWS APP OFFERS
• Up-to-date European and world news in TEXT or VIDEO streaming
• HOME: our Editor’s choice for global news
• LIVE 24/7: Euronews TV in live streaming* to watch news of European countries
• JUST IN: constantly updated timeline of all the news, wires, reports and magazines
• Your favorites PROGRAMMES in VoD (Video On Demand) : No Comment, Musica, Aid Zone, Business Planet, Global Conversation, Futuris, Space, Smart Regions... And Good Morning Europe & Raw Politics
• Customized WIDGET to your home screen

MANAGE DATA SPEND AND USAGE
This app has been designed to let you manage your DATA PLAN with:
• The DATA SAVINGS feature: Choose if you want pictures, enriched stories or simply a text raw version
• The OFFLINE MODE: Download the articles for an offline reading. Once you enable Euronews’ OFFLINE MODE, you can safely switch your smartphone to Airplane mode.
Note: the OFFLINE MODE can be combined with the DATA SAVINGS feature. In that case, downloading content will use less data.

THE EURONEWS APP IS AVAILABLE IN 12 EDITIONS
• English
• Arabic
• French
• German
• Greek
• Hungarian
• Italian
• Persian
• Portuguese
• Russian
• Spanish
• Turkish

ABOUT US
Euronews is the most watched news channel in Europe. We cover world news from a European perspective, since 1993.
With 600 journalists and correspondents of more than 30 nationalities, Euronews is available 24/7 in 12 language editions. A truly independent media hub, Euronews offers a unique and diverse perspective on news, favoring facts and analysis over emotions.
We reach 420 million homes in 161 countries and are available across all platforms (web, mobile, connected TVs, radio, YouTube, Flipboard…), as well as on board airlines, cruise lines and in hotels.

HELP US MAKE EURONEWS BETTER
Thanks for your support and useful comments! We are building those apps for you and strive to enhance your experience using them: so don’t hesitate to share your ideas and feedback anytime. We will listen and respond: appsupport@euronews.com

JOIN US ALSO ON
• http://www.euronews.com
• http://facebook.com/euronews
• http://twitter.com/euronews
• http://youtube.com/euronews

DISCOVER & DOWNLOAD THE EURONEWS APPS
• www.euronews.com/apps

*Euronews live stream
• Available in English only on Arabic, Persian and Turkish editions.
• Unavailable in the USA due to distribution restrictions, in the following languages: English, French, German, Greek and Portuguese.
• Unavailable in Canada due to distribution restrictions, in the following languages: English and French.

title: Euronews: Daily breaking world news & Live TV

creator: Euronews
descriptionHtml:
Get news from a European perspective. The Euronews app offers:
✔ An OFFLINE MODE: Read stories without Internet connection
✔ A DATA SAVINGS feature to use less mobile data
✔ A SUPER-QUICK DOWNLOAD thanks to its lightweight (less than 5Mo)

★★ Say HELLO to the new Euronews for Android ★★
Every story can be told in many ways: See the perspectives from Euronews journalists in our other language teams.
Catch the latest breaking national and world news in the Euronews app. Enjoy live streaming videos, live TV and VOD, top stories, headlines and various programmes on Economy, Finance, Business, Sports, Politics and Culture!

TOP 5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD EURONEWS
#1 - A timeline of all the NEWS, wires, reports and magazines
#2 - TV in LIVE streaming
#3 - Special features of mobile DATA SAVING & OFFLINE MODE
#4 - VOD : Various programmes on Economy, Finance, Business, Sports, Politics and Culture
#5 - Giving access to INDEPENDENT, trustworthy and relevant news and business stories

THE EURONEWS APP OFFERS
• Up-to-date European and world news in TEXT or VIDEO streaming
• HOME: our Editor’s choice for global news
• LIVE 24/7: Euronews TV in live streaming* to watch news of European countries
• JUST IN: constantly updated timeline of all the news, wires, reports and magazines
• Your favorites PROGRAMMES in VoD (Video On Demand) : No Comment, Musica, Aid Zone, Business Planet, Global Conversation, Futuris, Space, Smart Regions... And Good Morning Europe & Raw Politics
• Customized WIDGET to your home screen

MANAGE DATA SPEND AND USAGE
This app has been designed to let you manage your DATA PLAN with:
• The DATA SAVINGS feature: Choose if you want pictures, enriched stories or simply a text raw version
• The OFFLINE MODE: Download the articles for an offline reading. Once you enable Euronews’ OFFLINE MODE, you can safely switch your smartphone to Airplane mode.
Note: the OFFLINE MODE can be combined with the DATA SAVINGS feature. In that case, downloading content will use less data.

THE EURONEWS APP IS AVAILABLE IN 12 EDITIONS

With 600 journalists and correspondents of more than 30 nationalities, Euronews is available 24/7 in 12 language editions. A truly independent media hub, Euronews offers a unique and diverse perspective on news, favoring facts and analysis over emotions.
We reach 420 million homes in 161 countries and are available across all platforms (web, mobile, connected TVs, radio, YouTube, Flipboard…), as well as on board airlines, cruise lines and in hotels.

#5 - Giving access to trusted & relevant news from a European Independent newsroom.

🔔 STAY CONNECTED ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH EURONEWS FOR ANDROID

🔎 THE EURONEWS APP OFFERS
• Up-to-date European and world news in video streaming or text
• Live 24/7: Euronews TV in live streaming to watch video news of European countries
• Home: our Editor’s choice for global news

• Your favorites programmes in VoD: No Comment, Euronews Witness, Good News, Creators, Musica, Business Planet, Global Conversation, Smart Regions

✔ A dark mode to optimize the reading comfort

• The data savings feature: choose if you want pictures, enriched stories or simply a text raw version
• The offline mode: download the articles for an offline reading. Once you enable Euronews’ offline mode, you can safely switch your smartphone to Airplane mode.
Note: the offline mode can be combined with the data savings feature. In that case, downloading content will use less data.

• Your favourites programmes in video on demand: No Comment, The Europe Conversation, European stories, Europe in motion, EU decoded
• Must have features:
✔ A dark mode to optimize the reading comfort
✔ An offline mode - Read breaking news articles without Internet connection
✔ A data savings feature to use less mobile data

📚 MANAGE DATA SPEND AND USAGE
This app has been designed to let you manage your data plan with:
• The data savings feature: choose if you want pictures, enriched stories or simply a text raw version
• The offline mode: download the articles for an offline reading. Once you enable Euronews’ offline mode, you can safely switch your smartphone to Aeroplane mode.
Note: the offline mode can be combined with the data savings feature. In that case, downloading content will use less data.

💬 ABOUT US
The No.1 international news channel in the European Union.
Resolutely impartial and independent. Euronews broadcasts multilingual global news with a distinctive European perspective on both TV and digital platforms. Reaching over 400 million TV households in 160 countries, including 82% of households in the EU and UK, and 29 million followers across all social media platforms.
Since 1993, Euronews has been the leader in European news, resulting in a unique European identity and multilingual model across 13 language editions and five branded affiliates.

❤️ HELP US MAKE EURONEWS APP BETTER
Thanks for your support and useful comments!
Your feedback is essential for us to continue developing our app. Send us your comments and suggestions on these new features via the application on the menu "" Rate us"" or by email at appsupport@euronews.com.
